{{disambig-more: '''Strider''', or '''Stick-at-naught Strider''', was a nickname given to [[Aragorn]] by the people of [[Eriador]] (as for example at [[Bree]]) during his time as a [[Rangers of the North
The name seems to refer to the long legs of the Rangers, who were of [[Númenóreans
Strider: Númenórean]] blood, compared to the shorter-legged [[Bree-landers

{{disambig-more: Though Aragorn considered the name scornful, he took it as the name of his royal house: translated into [[Quenya]] as [[Telcontar]].
Leaving [[Minas Tirith]], [[Frodo Baggins]] jokingly named his [[pony]] "[[Strider (pony)
Strider: Strider]]" in order to honor his former companion.
